products.name: Hungry-Man Roasted Carved White Meat Turkey

extendedInfo.detail: White meat turkey, with mashed potatoes, gravy, mixed vegetables, seasoned stuffing and apple cranberry compote.  16 g protein. Per 1 Package: 400 calories; 2.5 g sat fat (13% DV); 1310 mg sodium (57% DV); 22 g total sugars.  A complete meal that satisfies. Apple cranberry compote. Crisp vegetables. Savory mashed potatoes. Sliced white meat turkey. Must be cooked thoroughly. SmartLabel: Scan or call 1-800-719-5859 for more food information.  Questions or comments? 1-800-719-5859; www.hungry-man.com.

extendedInfo.directions: Microwave Oven: Cook only one at a time. 1. Remove film from dessert. Slit film over turkey. Cook on high 5 minutes. 2. Stir potatoes and stuffing and rearrange turkey; re-cover film. 3. 3 to 3-1/2 min. Cook an additional 3 to 3-1/1 minutes. 4. 165 degrees F. Check that food is cooked thoroughly. Handle carefully; ItÛªs hot! Lt stand 1 minute; stir potatoes and enjoy! Conventional Oven: Do not prepare in toaster oven. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Remove film from dessert. Slit film over turkey. Cook on baking sheet in center of oven 45 to 50 minutes. Check that food is cooked thoroughly. Handle carefully; It's hot! Let stand 2 minutes; stir potatoes and enjoy! For Food Safety & Quality: Keep frozen. Do not thaw. Microwave directions developed with 1100-watt microwave ovens. Appliances vary. Adjust cooking times as needed. Food must be cooked thoroughly to 165 degrees F.  Keep frozen.  Best when used by date stamped on package.
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains: wheat, milk, soy, eggs.Do not reuse tray.
